law.text: In enacting KRS 272.1001, 272.101 to 272.341, it is the intention of the General Assembly to promote, foster and encourage the intelligent and orderly production and marketing of agricultural products through cooperation, to eliminate speculation and waste, to make the distribution of agricultural products between producer and consumer as direct as can be efficiently done, and to stabilize the marketing of agricultural products and to provide for the organization and incorporation of agricultural cooperative associations.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 115, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1.
